project_name: Computing ocean baroclinic modes of motion

items.name: input_file_name
items.description: name of the input NetCDF data file.

items.name: indata_path
items.description: path leading to the input NetCDF data file. If on WINDOWS, please substitute backslash with \

items.name: temperature_name
items.description: name of TEMPERATURE variable within NetCDF input file.

items.name: salinity_name
items.description: name of SALINITY variable within NetCDF input file.

items.name: lat_var_name
items.description: name of LATITUDE variable within NetCDF input file.

items.name: lon_var_name
items.description: name of LONGITUDE variable within NetCDF input file.

items.name: depth_var_name
items.description: name of DEPTH variable within NetCDF input file.

items.name: time_var_name
items.description: name of TIME variable within NetCDF input file.

items.name: lat_name
items.description: name of LATITUDE dimension within NetCDF input file.

items.name: lon_name
items.description: name of LONGITUDE dimension within NetCDF input file.

items.name: depth_name
items.description: name of DEPTH dimension within NetCDF input file.

items.name: time_name
items.description: name of TIME dimension within NetCDF input file.

items.name: lat_min
items.description: value of minimum latitude in °N (°S are negative)
items.note: set lat_min = lat_max if punctual profile is considered.

items.name: lat_max
items.description: value of maximum latitude in °N (°S are negative)
items.note: set lat_max = lat_min if punctual profile is considered.

items.name: lon_min
items.description: value of minimum longitude in °E (°W are negative)
items.note: set lon_min = lon_max if punctual profile is considered.

items.name: lon_max
items.description: value of maximum longitude in °E (°W are negative)
items.note: set lon_max = lon_min if punctual profile is considered.

items.name: lat_step
items.description: value of latitude step (to find the extremant values).

items.name: lon_step
items.description: value of longitude step (to find the extremant values).

items.name: starting_time
items.description: starting value of time period during which temp and sal averages must be computed.
items.note: set starting_time = ending_time if only one time step is considered.

items.name: ending_time
items.description: ending value of time period during which temp and sal averages must be computed.
items.note: set ending_time = starting_time if only one time step is considered.

items.name: n_modes
items.description: number of vertical baroclinic modes of motion to be computed.
